synopsis: The second season of JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Stardust Crusaders. Joutarou and his allies battle the nine Egyptian god stands in order to defeat Dio and save Holly from her stand which she cannot control.
title: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Stardust Crusaders 2nd Season
title_jp: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 スターダストクルセイダース
